title: SKT T1 Team Icon won't show in Summoner Icon Loots?
body: When I bought the SKT T1 Team Icon I tried upgrading but it wouldn't show so I reread the article it said it would come out 19.20. A day later i saw someone with the Cloud 9/C9 summoner icon upgraded? So i asked him to add me and show me how he did it. He sent me a picture of the tier 3 one next in his loot. So he told me to ask on the Board on how to fix this. Also in my purchase history it wasn't showing that i bought the SKT T1 Icon and i tried buying the C9 icon and it worked? Please Help Me Fix This Problem ;-;. #SKT T1 FTW :D

replies.body: When I bought the SKT T1 Team Icon I tried upgrading but it wouldn't show so I reread the article it said it would come out 19.20. A day later i saw someone with the Cloud 9/C9 summoner icon upgraded? So i asked him to add me and show me how he did it. He sent me a picture of the tier 3 one next in his loot. So he told me to ask on the Board on how to fix this. Also in my purchase history it wasn't showing that i bought the SKT T1 Icon and i tried buying the C9 icon and it worked? Please Help Me Fix This Problem ;-;. #SKT T1 FTW :D

We've been seeing a few issues with this and have been handling them through [support tickets](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). I recommend submitting one so we can work with you to resolve this.

Let me know if you have any questions.
I am having the exact same problem and just submitted a report.

Hello, I'm not sure I understand your issue but here's a precise FAQ:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/226192107-2016-Worlds-Guide-Crafting-championship-skins-and-more-

You can also send a request to player Support and they will be able to tell you exactly what you bought and when. Maybe you think you own SKT T1 icon but you actually don't.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
I have the SKT T1 Icon on right now but i can't upgrade it to tier 2 or 3 R.I.P
